column4: Three laptop computers taken from unsecured office
Unknown suspect on foot fired several shots striking a vehicle off-campus and fled on foot / Motorist reported no injuries / CPD case HZ221837
Individual found 2 shotgun shells in basement of residence / Turned shells over to UCPD for proper disposal
Subject running on sidewalk reported he believed he was struck and knocked to the ground by automatic entry gate at Shapiro Hall / Transported to ER by CFD EMS for evaluation and treatment
Two oil paintings taken from room 203
UC owned vehicle involved in property damage traffic crash on I-57 / ISP report 03-16-05238
An individual was observed taking 2 pressure valves from a Bob Cat parked in the alley / When confronted subject returned the property / Victim refused prosecution
Unknown subject took a package of gum without paying
Four signs were taken from a display in the Main Quad
Passenger in car threw a water bottle at a cyclist / Cyclist not injured
Report of suspicious phone call received by a staff member
